attributes.action: Allow 16/17 year olds in the UK a chance to vote in a second EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Hear our voice! Social media is currently full of heated debates on the descions being made in our country and the majority of it is fuelled by people under the legal age to vote. Give us a chance to have our say.
attributes.background: We are the next generation and this issue will affect our opportunities and our future the most. Shouldn't we get a say in a matter that will change young people's lives the most?
